title: Gaming Purse, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: embroidered on supplementary warp pile (velvet)
dimensions: H x diam.: 6 x 22.9 cm (2 3/8 x 9 in.)
description: Drawstring embroidered gaming purse in silk and metallic embroidery on a green velvet ground; coat of arms on bottom. Lined with white leather and red silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Gaming Purse, 18th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: embroidered on supplementary warp pile (velvet). 1975-3-1.
